title: Omega - The Gift and The Curse
overview: Featuring singer-songwriter Omarion, this new docu-series goes beyond the veil of what it's like to live under the celebrity microscope and gives fans an exclusive look on what it's like to succeed, transition, rebuild, and evolve into your own man. The docu-series takes fans behind the scenes with exclusive never-before-seen interviews, rehearsals, tour footage and performances across the U.S. from one of the biggest Reunion Tours.
